item.title: Setting up a new Laptop with Puppet
item.description: Hello folks. So, some of you know puppet, some of you don’t. Puppet is a configuration management system. It’s quite awesome. I like working with it. One of the benefits of puppet is, that I never, ever, EVER have to setup a new laptop from scratch, EVER again. I’m writing a puppet manifest file which sets up my new laptop to my liking. I will improve it as I go along.
